adjectives.description: worshipable (comparative more worshipable, superlative most worshipable)

entries.meaning: Capable of being worshipped; worthy of veneration.
examples: In addition, Kali, spouse of Shiva, is presented as an object of devotion  […]  who is "the Image and Embodiment of all the  […]  Devas." She is multiform, worshipable in each, "Mother of all."
